remarks: Ordering property of the converse of the map defined by ~ df-mapd . (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mapdcnvord.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdcnvord.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdcnvord.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdcnvord.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran M ) $.
mapdcnvord.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ran M ) $.
mapdcnvordN $p |- ( ph -> ( ( `' M ` X ) C_ ( `' M ` Y ) <-> X C_ Y ) ) $.
